      • isMarkingsDisplayed

        public boolean isMarkingsDisplayed()
        Description copied from interface: DocumentSessionController
        Checks if markings are displayed. You could toggle this value by calling DocumentSessionController.toggleMarkings(). If no more markings are left this will return false.
        Specified by:
        isMarkingsDisplayed in interface DocumentSessionController
        Returns:
        true, if markings are currently displayed

      • isStepMode

        public boolean isStepMode()
        Description copied from interface: DocumentSessionController
        Checks if isStepMode is on. You could toggle step mode by calling DocumentSessionController.toggleStepMode() if step mode is supported by current DocumentSessionController implementation. See DocumentSessionController.isSupportsStepMode()
        Specified by:
        isStepMode in interface DocumentSessionController
        Returns:
        true, if isStepMode is on
